name: SAPLink plugins
short_description:
Plug-ins I have developed for SAPLink.

Plugins for TABU, TDAT, VDAT, CDAT, SAPScript TEXT and TXTS objects require ZSAPLINK_TOOLS helper class.

Plugin for BOR objects (SOBJ) require my modified ZSAPLINK_PROGRAM (PROG) class, because the standard is not able to save BOR programs.

NUGGET file NUGG_SAPLINK_REPLACEMENTS.nugg contains all SAPLink standard files I had to replace in order for the plug-ins to work. There were only minor changes that should not interfere with normal usage of these files. ZSAPLINK_PROGRAM class is needed for SOBJ to work. TXTS objects require modified ZSAPLINK class to work. TXTS are pseudo SAP objetcs that represent a collection of SAPScript TEXT objects, where one up to four key fields can be specified as wildcards (*). SAPLink version I use is Version 1.0.4, thus all modified files I'm supplying are from this version.

BOR (SOBJ) PLUGIN MUST EMAIL ME!

Please email me if you have any doubts or want more details on TXTS object.

lino@hr.com.br
summary: These are my plugins for SAPLink
